content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains the following adult content:

- Explicit sex
- Sexual violence
- Abuse of drugs, tobacco and alcohol
- Realistic violence
- Explicit language

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel based or M1 under Rosetta
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
